en_description: Suncakes are a must-buy specialty  in Taichung. It is made out of butter. What's the most common stuffing in the sun cakes?
link:
The must-buy snake in Taichung is suncake. The filling is prepared with sugar, maltose, butter, salt, flour, and milk, after being wrapped into the pastry.

en_description: How does the beef soup is usually cooked in the famous Beef culture festival in Tainan?
link:
Beef culture festival is held every year in Tainan. In addition, the tourist must-try dish is beef soup. Most  beef soups are made of a clear broth, ultra-thin strips of medium rare beef, and occasionally a side of raw ginger and soy sauce for dipping.

en_description: Which mountain is the tallest one in Taiwan?
link:
Taiwan is a mountainous island in Asia with the largest and most dense mountains in the world. Most of her mountains have high peaks with elevations of more than 3000 m above sea level. Yushan is the tallest mountain in Taiwan at an elevation of 3952 m.

en_description: Which of the following is not included in the Kinmen souvenirs?
link:
Reminders of the military past are everywhere in Kinmen. The souvenirs of Kinmen include the special Kinmen knives, peanut candies (gong tang). kaoliang liquor, noodles, and wind lion god products.

en_description: Penghu as the largest outlying island of Taiwan attracts many visitors every year, which listed selection is not Penghu famous for?
link:
The Penghu Islands are a cluster of 90 small islands and islets in the Taiwan Strait, which is  just off the west coast of Taiwan. This gorgeous archipelago offers amazing ocean views and is rich in history and culture. There are lots of famous tourist attractions, such as Twin-Hearts Stone Weir, Kuanyin Pavilion and Underwater Postbox, etc.

en_description: How many floors does the highest building in Taiwan have?
link:
The Taipei 101 was the highest building in the world from 2004-2010, with 101 floors above ground (hence the name 101) and 5 floors below ground.

en_description: Which of the following festival is held in Miaoli?
link:
Every April and May, for two full months, Tung flowers bloom throughout Taiwan, especially in the Hakka settlements in Miaoli County. The Hakka Tung Blossom Festival is held annually amid much fanfare, and a series of fun activities are held to promote tourism in Miaoli County.

en_description: What do people do during Lantern Festival?
link:
There are many activities held across Taiwan during the Lantern Festival. During the festival, thousands of sky lanterns are lit over Pingxi District in Taiwan.

en_description: Which sport is called the national sport in Taiwan?
link:
Baseball is famous in Taiwan since 1970s. Also, Taiwan is the third country to have a national team of baseball in Asia.

en_description: Which one is not an outlying island of Taiwan?
link:
There are in total of 166 islands, which include Lanyu, Green Island, Kinmen, Penghu, and Matsu, around Taiwan.

en_description: Which of the following animal is not native to Taiwan?
link:
Taiwan has rich biological resources, and is famous for its biodiversity. Also, there are several endemic species such as Formosan Macaque, Taiwan Landlocked Masu Salmon, Taiwan Black Bear, and Taiwan Blue Magpie.
